transcript:
Hello, my name is Ethan Mendonsa and
this is my AI uh technical analyst agent
made in NAN. So here as we can see I
have a telegram trigger that updates
based on a message that I sent which in
this case is Apple and it does goes
through the open a chat model um and a
simple window buffer memory and thus um
goes through this tool which is get
chart as we can see through the second
workflow that I have which gets the
workflow input trigger which is the
apple in this case sets the ticker and
gets the chart URL from
from the API chart um API chart website
downloads the chart and then from there
does a technical analysis using the open
AI um chat model and then sends the
chart as a photo as we can see here this
is the first thing that we see and here
as we can see we have a chart of the the
recent Apple
um stock prices. Next, um
we can ask it to essentially analyze
this and do a technical analysis for
Apple based on this chart and based on
the recent trends and collects the data
from from various sources and gives me a
clear image as to what I want.
Additionally, once I ask it to explain
it, it can go further and explain some
of the the the thoughts that it has and
thus makes much more easier to for me to
choose whether I want to buy, sell or
hold this particular um this particular
stock.
